name: Dino Design
tagline: We Specialize in BIG IDEAS, with Great Results
description:
Dino Design was founded in 1984. We proudly take on the role of visual storytellers.
We strive to create work that is memorable, effective and well thought out.
Good design and marketing should instill some sort of emotion. Not only by its intended obvious message but by the little details as well. We would love to share our work in its intended form. If you, however, canâ€™t find the time to meet with us we have provided a few samples of our big ideas.
